description: Try our easy to follow Beef Bourguignon recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Beef stew,Low saturated fat,High fibre,High protein,Low salt,Low sugar,Low fat,Beef,Father's Day
name: Beef Bourguignon Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g button mushrooms, left whole (or halved if large)
600g blade, trimmed of excess fat (or topside)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large heavy based pan and brown beef in batches then set aside. Lower heat and add onions and mushrooms and cook until golden brown. Stir in flour and tomato paste and cook gently for 1-2 minutes.
Return beef to pan and add red wine, hot water, stock and carrots. Cover and simmer gently for 1 hour, removing the lid for the last 20 minutes of cooking.
Garnish with parsley before serving with steamed vegetables and mashed potatoes.
